short_summary: GC procuring glass products for CSC facility in Port-Cartier, QC.
description: PWGSC, on behalf of Correctional Service Canada, is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition and delivery of 160 Tempered, laminated glass, as detailed in Annex A of the Solicitation document.
full_summary:
**[Tender Title]**
===============

**Request for Proposal (RFP)**
-----------------------------

**Document Title:** 21301-241992 – Tempered Glass for Port-Cartier Facility – Correctional Service Canada.

**Solicitation Number:** WS4053087631
**Publication Date:** June 21, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** July 20, 2023, 14:00:00

**Procurement Details**
----------------------

* **Procurement Category:** Goods
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None
* **Expected Contract Start and End Dates:** To be determined

**Tender Description**
---------------------

The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) is seeking proposals from qualified suppliers for the acquisition and delivery of 160 tempered, laminated glass products. The glass products must meet the specifications outlined in Annex A of the Solicitation document. Delivery is required at the Port-Cartier facility in Port-Cartier, Québec, Canada.

**Key Criteria**
----------------

* The tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Competitive – Open Bidding will be used to select the supplier
* Lowest Price will be the selection criterion
* The procurement will be subject to the standard terms and conditions of the Government of Canada

**Contact Information**
----------------------

* **Contracting Authority:** Brunet, Luc (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** [luc.brunet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:luc.brunet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL**
--------------

The complete solicitation package, including the Solicitation document and all annexes, is available for download on the Ariba Discovery Platform at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16654971](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16654971). Interested suppliers must obtain an access code from Ariba to access the solicitation package. I look forward to seeing the proposal submission. Please let me know if you have any further questions.

Completed, but in vouchers, there are many details omitted. Happy to be corrected.

### Mandate Information

Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16654971?extsite=MTY2NTQ5NzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5
